sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnservereqpmnrelate ( SERVER_EQPMN_ID /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , SERVER_ID /* */ ) VALUES ( #serverEqpmnId# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #serverId# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnservereqpmnrelate SET SERVER_EQPMN_ID=#serverEqpmnId# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ , SERVER_ID=#serverId# /* */ WHERE SERVER_EQPMN_ID=#serverEqpmnId# /* */ AND SERVER_ID=#serverId# /* */
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnservereqpmnrelate WHERE SERVER_EQPMN_ID=#serverEqpmnId# /* */ AND SERVER_ID=#serverId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT SERVER_EQPMN_ID /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , SERVER_ID /* */ FROM comtnservereqpmnrelate WHERE SERVER_EQPMN_ID=#serverEqpmnId# /* */ AND SERVER_ID=#serverId# /* */

SELECT SERVER_EQPMN_ID /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , SERVER_ID /* */ FROM comtnservereqpmnrelate WHERE 1=1
SERVER_EQPMN_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
FRST_REGISTER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY SERVER_EQPMN_ID DESC /* */ , SERVER_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnservereqpmnrelate WHERE 1=1
SERVER_EQPMN_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
FRST_REGISTER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
